items.name: Butter Chicken
items.description: A classic dish of chicken simmered in a rich, creamy tomato and cashew gravy.

items.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
items.description: Tender boneless chicken pieces cooked in a rich & creamy capsicum, tomato and onion gravy

items.name: Lamb Roganjosh
items.description: A classical slow cooked tender Lamb in tomato onion gravy with generous use of aromatic spices

items.name: Lamb Madras
items.description: Lamb cooked in a coconut milk gravy with ground spices

items.name: Beef Vindaloo
items.description: Beef and potatoes cooked in a hot red chilly gravy with herbs

items.name: Beef & vegetables
items.description: Beef cooked with aromatic blend of brown onion and vegetables

items.name: Prawn Masala
items.description: Prawns cooked in whole spices and capsicum gravy

items.name: Fish Curry
items.description: Barramundi done in creamy coconut gravy

items.name: Kadhai Paneer
items.description: Fresh paneer pieces tossed in an Indian wok with onion, capsicum & tomato in thick gravy

items.name: Palak Paneer
items.description: Cottage cheese cooked in a spinach with onion tomato sauce garnish with cream

items.name: Daal Tadka
items.description: Yellow lentil cooked with herbs and spices served with a quick dash of fried cumin & garlic

items.name: Kofta Curry
items.description: Delicious cheese and potatoes balls cooked in a creamy tomato sauce

items.name: Mix Vegetable
items.description: Assorted vegetables cooked in a tomato onion base gravy

items.name: Mushrooms & Peas Curry
items.description: Small pieces of mushroom with peas finished with onion tomato gravy
